ModMetaData.name: Meteor Attractor
ModMetaData.author: Kimtaeco
ModMetaData.description:
thanks to robinthedragon(https://steamcommunity.com/id/robindrago) for the amazing thumbnail!
Are you tired of using your long ranged scanner and then caravaning out to mine everything just to come back and repeating that process again? No more, You can just make smart people make rocks come to your colony! (Scanner image shamelessly stolen from vanilla)
